text: The following lists events that happened in 1987 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Vigdís Finnbogadóttir *Prime Minister - Steingrímur Hermannsson, Þorsteinn Pálsson ==Events== ==Births== Theódór Elmar Bjarnason *30 January - Matthías Vilhjálmsson, footballer *4 March - Theódór Elmar Bjarnason, footballer *6 March - Ragnar Þórhallsson, musician *14 May - Ari Freyr Skúlason, footballer. *27 June - Katrín Ómarsdóttir, footballer ==Deaths== *13 August – Guðmundur Ingólfsson, swimmer (b. 1929). *19 December – Guðmundur Ívarsson Guðmundsson, politician (b. 1909). ==References== Category:1980s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1987 in Iceland
